title: Marvel Films
text:

May 5 Unrevealed [[Marvel Cinematic Universe]] film{{cite|ref=true|url=https://deadline.com/2024/10/blade-predator-badlands-disney-release-dates-1236144383/|title="Marvel Studios' 'Blade' Removed From 2025 Release Schedule, Disney Dates 'Predator: Badlands' Instead"|accessdate=24 October 2024|last=D'Alessandro|first=Anthony|date=October 22, 2024|publisher=''Deadline Hollywood''|archiveurl=https://archive.ph/31FNU|archivedate=October 22, 2024}}
November 10 }} ==Notes== * Not every film on this page is directly made by Disney and/or Marvel Studios. :1. {{note|Red Sonja}}Based on the [[Red Sonja Comic Books]] originally published by Marvel Comics. :2. {{note|MIB}}Based on the Men in Black Comic Books, originally published by {{WP|Aircel Comics}}. Aircel became part of [[Malibu Comics]], which in turn became part of Marvel Comics. :3. {{note|KA}}Based on the [[Kick-Ass Comic Books]] originally published by [[Icon Comics]], an imprint of Marvel Comics. :4. {{note|broadway}}Theatrical in the sense of being a Broadway musical. :5. {{note|Kingsman}}Based on the comic series {{sl|Secret Service Vol 1}} originally published by Icon Comics, an imprint of Marvel Comics. :6. {{note|FF94}}Originally planned to be released theatrically. Is currently only available through bootleg recordings. ==Canceled Films== Films that never entered production, but were given planned release dates, listed in order of their final ones. * ''{{Wc|marvel-movies|Spider-Man 4|Spider-Man 4}}'' (May 5, 2011) * ''{{Wc|marvel-movies|The Amazing Spider-Man 3|The Amazing Spider-Man 3}}'' (June 10, 2016) * ''{{Wc|marvel-movies|The Sinister Six|The Sinister Six}}'' (November 11, 2016) * ''{{Wc|marvel-movies|Fantastic Four 2|Fantastic Four 2}}'' (June 9, 2017) * ''{{Wc|spiderman-films|The Amazing Spider-Man 4|The Amazing Spider-Man 4}}'' (May 4, 2018) * ''Silver & Black''([https://marvel-movies.fandom.com/wiki/Black_Cat_(film)?oldid=223158 Marvel Movies])({{WP|Silver & Black (unproduced film)|Wikipedia}}) (February 8, 2019) * ''[https://marvel-movies.fandom.com/wiki/Inhumans_(film)?oldid=232069 Inhumans]'' (July 12, 2019) * ''Gambit''({{Wc|marvel-movies|Gambit (film)|Marvel Movies}})({{WP|Gambit (unproduced film)|Wikipedia}}) (March 13, 2020) * ''{{Wc|marvel-movies|El Muerto (film)|El Muerto}}'' (January 12, 2024) ==External Links== *{{Wc|marvel-movies|Marvel_Movies|Marvel Movies Wiki}} *{{Wc|xmenmovies|X-Men Movies Wiki|X-Men Movies Wiki}} *{{Wc|spiderman-films|Spider-Man Films Wiki|Spider-Man Films Wiki}} *{{WP|List of films based on Marvel Comics publications|Wikipedia's list of Marvel films}} **{{WP|List of unproduced film projects based on Marvel Comics|Wikipedia's list of unproduced Marvel films}} **{{WP|List of unproduced films based on Marvel Comics imprints publications|Wikipedia's list of unproduced Marvel imprint films}} ==References== {{Reflist}} [[ru:Список фильмов Marvel]] [[tr:Marvel filmleri]] [[es:Películas]] [[Category:Films]] [[Category:Lists]]
